alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 4:30PM PDT until September 01 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO AND WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 430 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across far southeastern Inyo County and portions of western Clark County. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Flooding reported at Highway 160 south of Tecopa. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Shoshone, Tecopa, Sandy Valley, Highway 160 south of Pahrump, and Lovell Canyon Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
